title: General
fullText:
This Standard sets out the requirements for electrical installations associated with site supplies for connectable electrical installations that are intended for connection to low voltage (LV) a.c. supply systems (i.e. exceeding 50 V a.c. but not exceeding 1 000 V a.c.).
The particular requirements of this Standard replace, modify, or are additional to the general requirements of AS/NZS 3000 for the electrical wiring of site supplies for connectable electrical installations.
NOTE 1 Guidance on the calculation of maximum demand for switchboards/service pillars is provided in Appendix A.
NOTE 2 See Appendix B for guidance on providing connection instructions to patrons.
